    Check that pulling a Phase from disk returns a different Phase object with the same runtime object such that the difference between these two objects is empty (meaning that the difference calculated by Phase.compare(Phase) has at most only the phase's name into it)

    • pull_withValidId

      @Test void pull_withValidId()
      Check that pulling a Phase from disk returns a different Phase object with the same runtime object such that the difference between these two objects is empty (meaning that the difference calculated by Phase.compare(Phase) has at most only the phase's name into it)

    • drop_withInvalidId

      @Test void drop_withInvalidId()
      Check that trying to drop a record that doesn't exist throws an exception

    • drop_withValidId

      @Test void drop_withValidId()
      Check that given a valid id the correct file is deleted
